reviewText: very nice dvd. happy to have it as part of my train collection. thank you
This is a European dvd you can't watch it on an American dvd

It seems the older I get I suddenly get involved with books like "Pride and Prejudice" and will watch all movies (sometimes my eyes will not allow me to read books) by that author.  Now trains have arrived and I really enjoy taking these magical train rides from the comfort of my easy chair through a DVD.

I find watching and imagining I am on the train works for me.  This is sooo fun to do.

Who says you need a lot of money to retire..Just use your imagination and take a train ride with the help of this excellent product.
Very good DVD, disapponted it was more about the trip, and less about the equipment. All in all, very very nice. A shame it no longer is in operation.
THIS IS ONE OF THE BEST TRAIN DVDS I'VE SEEN. I HAVE WATCHED IT SEVERAL TIMES AND NEVER GET TIRED OF IT.
